sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './SecondMoth.css'; // Import the CSS file for styling const SecondMonthForm = ({ handleSubmit }) => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ IPV: false, IPV_ID: '', OPV: false, OPV_ID: '', Rota_Virus: false, Rota_Virus_ID: '', Penta: false, Penta_ID: '', PCV: false, PCV_ID: '', Doctor_Name: '' }); const doctors = ['د. سميث', 'د. جونسون', 'د. لي']; // Example list of doctors const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value, type, checked } = e.target; setFormData({ ...formData, [name]: type === 'checkbox' ? checked : value }); }; const onSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); handleSubmit('secondMonth', formData); }; return (
); }; export default SecondMonthForm;
